EmailTemplate.description: Sent to SUMO Admin if Resource Calendar Mapping becomes to failed
EmailTemplate.name: Resource Calendar Mapping Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Administrator,
We have detected an error with your SUMO Resource Mapping. Please follow the below steps to disconnect and reconnect your resources to resolve the error.
Navigate to SUMO Admin Settings Click on Calendar Connector Click on Resource Calendar Review connected resources
Thank you,
SUMO Support Team
